Sentencas: The temperature distribution of an operating planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is experimentally investigated under direct internal reforming conditions.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution of planar solid oxide fuel cell: Effects of gas flow, power generation, and direct internal reforming

Sentencas: An in situ measurement is conducted using a cell holder and an infrared (IR) camera.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution of planar solid oxide fuel cell: Effects of gas flow, power generation, and direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The effects of the gas flow configuration, exothermic power generation reaction, and endothermic steam-methane reforming reaction are examined at a furnace temperature of 770 degrees C.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution of planar solid oxide fuel cell: Effects of gas flow, power generation, and direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The fuel flow and airflow are set to a coflow or counterflow configuration.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution of planar solid oxide fuel cell: Effects of gas flow, power generation, and direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The heat generation and absorption by the reactions are varied by tuning the average current density and the concentration of methane in the supplied fuel.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution of planar solid oxide fuel cell: Effects of gas flow, power generation, and direct internal reforming

Sentencas: The maximum value of the local temperature gradient along the cell tends to increase with increasing internal reforming ratio, regardless of the gas flow configuration.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution of planar solid oxide fuel cell: Effects of gas flow, power generation, and direct internal reforming

Sentencas: From the view point of a small temperature gradient, the counterflow configuration clearly shows better characteristics than that of the coflow, regardless of the internal reforming ratio.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution of planar solid oxide fuel cell: Effects of gas flow, power generation, and direct internal reforming
